encounter: You stumble upon a scene where whirlpool spirits are engaged in performing a ritual to calm a storm around a mysterious, glowing underwater crystal, seemingly crucial for investigate reports of disappearing ships in a cursed sea..

With investigate a series of shipwrecks caused by a vengeful ghost ship. On your mind, the sudden appearance of a powerful whirlpool pulling ships downward accompanied by rustling of seaweed in the currents becomes a challenging diversion.
